mainHero.title: Jorge Mendes
mainHero.subtitle: Senior Developer
mainHero.description: Experienced web developer with a talent for efficient solutions, building responsive applications with beautiful layouts

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Senior Software Engineer with nearly 10 years of experience, developing scalable applications from scratch or helping growing existing projects, using mainly with JavaScript, React, Redux, TypeScript. I have worked on start-up companies with Agile methodologies both in person and remotely.

Today i am focused in learning new techniques and skills. One of my most notable skills is my ability to translate client needs into an efficient technology solution. I am an excellent communicator and know how to listen and understand.

I am also highly efficient in working as part of a team. I understand the importance of collaboration in achieving common goals and work well with other developers and team members. I am able to contribute positively to team dynamics, bringing creative ideas and solutions to the technical challenges the team faces.
list: Experience in architecting and building and documenting web applications,
Experience with modern frontend technologies such as React, Typescript, and CSS frameworks as styled-components, Tailwind CSS, MaterialUI,
Aptitude to quickly learn new languages and technologies,
Strong ability to work independently and self-guided,
Collaboration with Product and Design professionals.

journeyInfo.title: Professional experience
journeyInfo.description: Here are the places I've worked during my career.

journey.description: In my current position at Escala, I act as a senior FullStack developer, a company that makes schedules in an easy way. The project that I work on is used for managing the Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein (ICU) intensive care unit. The project was so good that it became a Saas platform that other clients of many industries.

I worked participating in projects, on the front-end in order to meet my clients' needs, always seeking maximum quality in the code and with a lot of love. Focusing on developing solutions for the company's privacy and international policies.

journey.institution: FDTE - Foundation for the Technological Development of Engineering
journey.description: I work as a consultant, on projects, being a full-stack developer, thus being part of the workforce of these clients, as well as on projects, building resources, bug fixes, refactoring and rebuilding when necessary.
I worked developing products and internal solutions for the company and clients, updating the products that already existed.
I worked Assisting in the development of email marketing and functional responsive websites, tailored for our customers.

journey.institution: SRTI - São Roque technology of information
journey.description: I worked in the development of web applications, responsive websites, mainly with front-end development.

journey.institution: São Paulo State Department of Education
journey.description: My responsibilities have always been to take care of public property, establish contact between students and school management, resolve conflicts between teachers and students.

To learn subjects related to specific programming for the internet, the student will study Mathematics, especially logical reasoning. Statistics, English and marketing are also part of the course, in addition to design.
Worked as a freelance web developer, that built institutional websites and on free time make computer maintenance.

journey.institution: Centro Paula Souza - Etec São Roque
journey.description: The IT technician develops and operates systems, applications and graphical interfaces. Assembles database structures and codes programs. Designs, implements and maintains systems and applications. Selects work resources, programming languages, tools and methodologies for systems development.
